item.title: 埃及通胀在第四个月放缓，摆脱了面包价格上涨的影响

item.title: 日元和人民币相关性走近是亚洲货币的危险信号
item.description: 亚洲最重要的两种货币正以前所未有的态势齐头并进，在美元持续走强的情况下，这两种货币广泛下跌的风险正在增加。【原文：Asia’s two most important currencies are moving together like never before, increasing the risk of a broad decline among their regional peers amid the relentless strength of the dollar.】

item.title: 数十艘受制裁的俄罗斯油轮在世界各地闲置
item.description: 从俄罗斯波罗的海的寒冷水域到海参崴的太平洋沿岸，以前为莫斯科运送石油的几十艘油轮如今空空如也，闲置在那里。【原文：From the frigid waters of Russia’s Baltic Sea to the Pacific shores of Vladivostok, dozens of tankers that previously moved Moscow’s oil are now sitting empty and idle.】

item.title: 印度首次公开募股因快速回报的诱惑不断吸引个人投资者
item.description: 由于新股的高涨幅超过了大盘和海外上市，预计散户投资者今年将继续涌入印度的首次公开发行股票市场。【原文：Retail investors are expected to keep piling into initial public offerings in India this year, as hefty gains for new stocks outpace the broader market and listings abroad.】

item.title: 机构投资者将参与日本央行债券购买辩论
item.description: 在日本大型银行周二呼吁全面削减债券购买量之后，机构投资者周三将对日本央行的债券购买量进行讨论。【原文：Institutional investors will weigh into the debate on the Bank of Japan’s bond buying Wednesday after the nation’s megabanks on Tuesday called for sweeping cuts to purchases.】

item.title: 摩根大通将比亚迪目标价上调 80% 以上以展望未来
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）的分析师将比亚迪公司的目标股价上调了80%以上，因为预计这家中国汽车制造商将在未来两年内向全球交付600万辆汽车。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s analysts raised their price targets for BYD Co. by more than 80% on expectations the Chinese automaker will deliver 6 million vehicles globally in the next two years.】

item.title: 昂贵的可可供应即将冲击巧克力制造商，刺激需求回落
item.description: 上一季度可可加工可能略有放缓，但随着巧克力生产商开始真正感受到价格昂贵的可可豆带来的压力，可可加工将出现更大幅度的下滑。【原文：Cocoa processing likely slowed a bit last quarter, but a steeper slump is looming as chocolatiers start to really feel the pinch of pricey beans.】

item.title: 董事长与当局会面，新加坡上市公司野马汽车创 2021 年以来最大跌幅
item.description: 在新加坡上市的优玛战略控股有限公司（Yoma Strategic Holdings Ltd.）称其董事长塞尔吉-潘（Serge Pun）正在与缅甸当局合作后，该公司股价创下三年多来最大跌幅。【原文：Singapore-listed shares of Yoma Strategic Holdings Ltd. plunged the most in over three years after the company said its chairman Serge Pun is cooperating with Myanmar authorities.】

item.title: 中国居民消费价格回升但通缩压力犹存
item.description: 6 月份，中国居民消费价格再次小幅上涨，连续第五个月徘徊在零点附近，这表明通货紧缩压力继续阻碍经济复苏。【原文：China’s consumer prices eked out another small gain in June, hovering near zero for a fifth month, a sign that deflationary pressures continue to impede an economic recovery.】

item.title: 新加坡股指有望创下 2018 年新高
item.description: 在即将到来的财报季之前，投资者的乐观情绪升温，新加坡股市有望创下六年来的新高。【原文：Singapore’s stocks are poised for a six-year high as investor optimism rises ahead of the upcoming earnings season.】

item.title: DeFi 最热门领域的利害关系
item.description: 在本期彭博加密时事通讯中，Sidhartha Shukla 描述了加密货币重构之争的利害关系。加密货币目前最热门的创新可以说是重构，它通过允许在此过程中使用的数字代币同时加固多个应用程序，放大了保护区块链所获得的回报。【原文：In this edition of the Bloomberg Crypto newsletter, Sidhartha Shukla describes what’s at stake in the fight over crypto restaking.Crypto’s hottest innovation right now is arguably restaking, which amplifies the returns earned for securing a blockchain by allowing the digital tokens used in the process to fortify multiple applications at once.】

item.title: 普渡制药公司赢得谈判萨克雷新交易的短暂窗口期
item.description: 普渡制药公司（Purdue Pharma LP）获得了与萨克勒家族成员谈判新协议的两个月时间，因为在美国最高法院否决了早前达成的 60 亿美元和解协议后，OyxContin 制造商及其所有者都在为可能出现的阿片类药物民事诉讼浪潮做准备。【原文：Purdue Pharma LP secured a two-month window to negotiate a new pact with members of the Sackler family as the OyxContin maker and its owners brace for a potential wave of civil opioid lawsuits after the US Supreme Court scuttled an earlier $6 billion settlement.】

item.title: 尽管 S&P 500 指数反弹，卖空者第二季度仍获利 100 亿美元

item.title: 债券交易员七月每天都在为国债反弹下注
